title: place.contactPoint
description: Contact info of the [place](./place.json), containing one or more phone numbers, email addresses, and/or website URLs.

phone.description: List of phone numbers for contact purposes (can be empty)

email.description: List of email addresses for contact purposes (can be empty)

url.description: List of URLs for contact purposes (can be empty)

items.description: URL to a website for contact purposes.
